data.title: Great Staff
data.text: Great place to stay while in Tuscaloosa.Hotel and rooms were well maintained. Staff were friendly and helpful. Complimentary cocktail reception in evening. Close to many restaurants. Definitely will stay here again.

data.title: Good business hotel stay
data.text: This is a new hotel with nice amenities, conveniently located near several good restaurants located within walking distance downtown. Side by Side restaurant in the hotel was excellent food & service. I also recommend Chucks Fish within a block of the hotel.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello from Embassy, 

We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your business stay with us and that you were able to enjoy a few of our great local restaurants. We hope you can come back and visit us when your traveling on leisure as well.  

Your Tuscaloosa Embassy Suites Team
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Place to stay in TTown
data.text:
(Huh......I thought I already sent off this review!)  

This hotel is our Go To Place to Stay in T'Town........love it.  This stay we were on the top floor.......I had my pick of rooms and chose floor 8, then over to the west (left) side of the floor looking north. If I had it to do over again, I'd go to the east side of the floor looking north.  The west side has the view / noise of the Lurleen Wallace Blvd. bridge, AND since there was a concert going on the night we arrived, we also had that "noise" to deal with.  However, overall, it wasn't really that noisy........but, I do suggest the opposite end.

Staff is consistently excellent.  Nice breakfast and Cocktail Hour.  Earphones are available in the Workout Room if you forgot yours.  The bathroom had plenty of drawers to put our things.  However, the kitchenette didn't have any silverware or dishes......maybe you have to request those items?

The location can't be beat, and we will continue to stay here when possible!

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Li C,

Thank you for your great review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. We are so glad we are " GO TO PLACE TO STAY IN TTOWN!   We love having you as a guest of ours. We are so glad that you love our amenities. We look forward to your return visit to TTOWN and the Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: First time Embassy Suites
data.text: This hotel was amazing.  First rate cocktail reception every evening and breakfast every morning.  The beds were the most comfortable i have ever slept in.  Hotel is right in the middle of many good restaurants.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Greetings Dominick, 

Thank you for your great review! We are so happy to hear we made a good impression on your first visit with Embassy Suites in Downtown Tuscaloosa. We hope that we will be your one and only choice while in the Tuscaloosa area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Chris Stapleton Concert
data.text: Loved this hotel. Staff is always friendly. The room had everything you could want/need for a relaxing trip. The only negative I have to say is that the "premium" room upgrade consisted of coffee and a handful of candy bars and chips. I wouldn't pay extra for that again.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Greetings Pam, 

Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites. The Embassy Team is happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon. We certainly welcome and appreciate all your feedback as we are always looking to provide a positive guest experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Consistently excellent!!!
data.text: I love this hotel! I love the evening cocktails especially the signature Crimson Tide!! Having a healthy breakfast option is great too! I didn't use the fitness room because it was too beautiful not to run outside.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Msstamper,

Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites in Downtown Tuscaloosa. We are pleased that you enjoyed our hotel and your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very Chic Hotel in Tuscaloosa!
data.text: This Embassy Suites was the prettiest Embassy Suites I have ever seen!  So chic and beautiful!  The lobby even smelled good!  The suites were really nice and spacious.  Everything was nicely decorated.  The bathrooms were pretty, beds were comfy.  The staff was so nice!  Loved the free happy hour in the evenings!  We were there visiting UA and it was a mile drive away.  Walking distance to great restaurants!  Really impressed with this hotel!!

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank You! Thank You! We are so glad to hear that our staff and hotel met all your needs while visiting the UA. We look forward to your return visit to the Embassy Suites in Downtown Tuscaloosa.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Friendly and Great Place to Stay
data.text: Perfect location. Friendly Staff with great attitudes. Great accommodations and great food. Each time I go back I feel like I am coming home. Everyone wants to make your stay great, from the front desk to the help on each floor. I will always come back. This was a business trip and we have also stayed with friends on the weekends

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Luke,

Thank you for your great review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. We are so glad that visiting our hotel makes you feel like you are at home!  That is a very nice statement about our Embassy.  Luke, hurry back we will be waiting for you.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business Trip turned into a delightful get-a-way
data.text: This hotel is conveniently situated in downtown within walking distance of the RiverWalk and plenty of restaurants and bars. Everything within the hotel was awesome. Staff was on point with breakfast and the evening reception. There was really no reason to go outside of the hotel except for entertainment.

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Adrienne0334,

Thank you for your great review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. We are so glad that our amenities fir your needs. We so look forward to your return visit to Tuscaloosa and the Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business
data.text: I had a great experience during my stay.  I had no problems.  The staff greeted me in the hall ways or on the premises.  There was even security in the parking lot one night because of an event being held near the hotel.  It was a business trip, but it wasn't far from where the conference was being held.  The breakfast was excellent.  For those who like to have a little cocktail, I'm sure they were happy since it was complimentary.  I didn't get t use the pool, but the fact that it was inside, was great.  Had I had a little more time.  I would have used that amenity also.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Vickie, the Embassy Team is happy to hear that we provided our guest with a great experience. We are always looking for ways to be your one and only choice while in Tuscaloosa. We look forward to seeing you again and hopefully you will get a chance to check out our great indoor pool that you missed this visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great clean and new property
data.text: We loved this Embassy Suites.  For the record, I am a Hilton Diamond, so I am in Embassy Suites dozens of times a year.  This is by far the nicest property I have seen in years.  Architecturally it's much different than other properties.  The location couldn't be better.  It's downtown and Depalma's is in the next block(Best restaurant in Tuscaloosa).  The staff was incredible and went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed and helped all around.  I would highly recommend this property if your going to the University of Alabama.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your loyalty to the Hilton brand. It is always great to hear that our staff succeeded in providing the service that our guests deserve and expect and that you are happy to recommend us to others. We look forward to being your choice again when you are in the Tuscaloosa area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of the best hotels in this chain
data.text: A group of twenty plus family members booked a block of Suites for a family wedding. I frequent the Embassy Suites chain in and near my home state. They all have a standard look, open atrium, balcony style floors looking down to the first level. Nice, but not spectacular. This hotel is recent construction and represents a remarkable improvement in amenities and appearance. The lobby was elegantly appointed, with beautiful sofas and chairs in muted tones. Beautiful, modern light fixtures were plentiful. The lobby had a very nice water feature. The beds were extremely comfortable, with high quality linens and pillows. The furniture was good quality and comfortable. The bathroom was spacious and well stocked with plush towels. The only thing that could have made it better would have been a Keurig coffee machine in the room, instead of a standard coffee pot. A small thing, that did not detract from the value. I will definitely return to this hotel on my next visit.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Tanya, thank you so much for the great feedback from your recent stay at Embassy Suites in Tuscaloosa. We really appreciate hearing that our guests enjoyed their stay with us and hope that you will choose us again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Gracious staff and high quality rooms
data.text: Stayed here for a long weekend while visiting my UA freshman.  The location is wonderful, lots of great dining options in short walking distance.  Our room was spotless, and the breakfast exceeded our expectations.  Mattress seemed equivalent to those in a luxury hotel.  We will definitely stay here next time we're in town.

owner_response.author: Stephenie  D, Front Office Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites in Tuscaloosa. We value your feedback and are thrilled to hear that your stay with us was a pleasant one. We look forward to seeing you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very nice hotel, great location
data.text:
Lovely lobby, rooms were spacious, clean, comfortable and decor was nice. I really like the layout of the newer Embassy Suites. Traveling with young adults and everybody had their 'space'.
Pool and gym were clean and equipment was newer and everything was thoughtfully appointed. Great location. Very safe. Easy parking. Close to nice shops and restaurants and close to campus without being too close.  Breakfast was plentiful and delicious. I think they could have been a little more careful about food handling and cleaning the plates, but that was just my one experience. Overall and excellent visit and I would definitely go back next time I'm in town.

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Liz,
Thank you for your nice review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. We are so glad that you and your family enjoyed our amenities, will mention something to the F&B and will keep a close eye on that for all. We look forward to your return visit to Tuscaloosa and the Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Perfect Hotel
data.text: This hotel is very clean and very nice. I have nothing negative to say about this hotel. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The bed was comfortable and I felt at home. Will definitely stay again!

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Thank you for your nice review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. We are so glad that we made you feel like you were home. We look forward to your return visit to Tuscaloosa and the Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very Clean
data.text: Very pleased with this hotel. We will definitely stay here again. Very clean rooms and friendly staff. Great complimentary breakfast. Also enjoyed complimentary drinks before the concert. We stayed here to attend a concert at the Tuscaloosa Amphitheater. Easy 10 minute walk to the venue.

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Alec,

Thank you for your review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. The location of our hotel is excellent for attending concerts at the Tuscaloosa Amphitheater. We look forward to your return visit for another concert and the Embassy Suites Downtown Hotel.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Jr Suite
data.text:
I stay at Embassy Suites often but had never been put in a Jr. suite-its one room with a small dinette.  As a Longtime Diamond member I would expect to be in a regular room-the typical Embassy two room suite.  It was just for one night, so no complaint.
Friendly staff.
Nice lobby
Upscale
Good breakfast
Quiet
Good location

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Leigh,

Thank you for your review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. We are one of the new generation Embassy Suites and we have many different choices and many aren't the two room suite. We are glad like you liked our Embassy Suites and look forward to your return visit.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Well Rested
data.text:
I have been traveling from AZ to GA for the last 8 months, I have stayed at several Hilton Properties during my travels. My stay in Tuscaloosa was by far the best. The property is beautiful and has a very relaxing feel. The bed was one of the most comfortable i have slept in, the room was quiet and immaculate. 

I checked in after midnight, there was one lady checking in before me and she was beyond hateful and rude, the kid working the desk(Stewart) was so patient and kind to her. I told Stewart he was more patient than i would have been and I offered to kick her in the shin.. he declined my offer.. 

The entire staff went out of their way to be helpful and everyone I talked too was beyond friendly. 

If your passing through this is the place to stay!

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Mia82768,

Thank you for your great review of our Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel. Thank you for noticing one of our Superstars, Stewart has a excellent personality and we are glad we have him. We look forward to your return visit to Tuscaloosa and the Embassy Suites Tuscaloosa Downtown Hotel.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: They were MY Psychiatrist !
data.text: I am a physician and board-certified psychiatrist and attended a professional conference there.  Both meeting room and personal room facilities were superb, but the personal touch was apparent when I misplaced my spiral bound organizer with personal and professional data on it.  Following a telephone call to Front Desk and Housekeeping, it was found in my room and is being Fed Exed to me as I type.  Thanks Housekeeping; Thanks "Anthony" at the front desk!  You went the extra mile. 'Grateful Doc, MD; PhD, Diplomate ABPN

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Fay,

It was great for us to host the Psychiatrist group this past weekend, we sure enjoyed helping everyone have a great conference.  Anthony, said no problem and was very glad to be able to assist with your request.  We sure hope we see you all in the future, again.

Thanks,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful Trip
data.text: This was a business/pleasure trip and the hotel was absolutely wonderful.  It was close to my meeting and to wonderful downtown attractions. The rooms were decorated beautifully and the beds were so comfortable.

owner_response.author: Steven H, General Manager at Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown, responded to this review
